name: intelligent-linux-server
description: Intelligent defaults for Linux server VM - auto-detects hardware
_comment: Optimized for headless server workloads with intelligent resource allocation

_detection_notes.vcpus: Auto-calculated as 25-50% of host cores based on workload

_detection_notes.network_mode: Bridge for direct network access (can use NAT)
